header_lines.title: TUX CODE BOOT CAMP - CHALLENGE FILE
orders: 4. Report back to Sergeant Tux when complete!
header_lines.reminder: REMEMBER: Comments are your BATTLE PLAN! Use them!

language_templates.Python:

if __name__ == "__main__":

language_templates.Assembly:
section .data
    ; Data section - Define your variables here
    msg db 'Challenge started!', 0xA
    len equ $ - msg

section .bss
    ; BSS section - Uninitialized data

section .text
    global _start

; Main entry point
; Purpose: Implement the challenge requirements here
_start:
    ; TODO: Write your code here, recruit!
    
    ; Exit program
    mov eax, 1
    xor ebx, ebx
    int 0x80

; Helper function - Break it down into manageable pieces!
; Purpose: Add any helper functions you need
helper_function:
    ; TODO: Implement helper logic
    ret

KTHXBYE

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. TuxChallenge.

DATA DIVISION.
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
*> Variables go here

PROCEDURE DIVISION.
MAIN-PROCEDURE.
    *> Main procedure - This is your entry point!
    *> Purpose: Implement the challenge requirements here
    
    DISPLAY 'Challenge started!'.
    
    *> TODO: Write your code here, recruit!
    
    STOP RUN.

language_templates.Modern Fortran:
program TuxModernChallenge
    use iso_fortran_env
    implicit none
    
    ! Main program - This is your entry point!
    ! Purpose: Implement the challenge requirements here
    
    print *, 'Challenge started!'
    
    ! TODO: Write your code here, recruit!
    
contains
    ! Helper function - Break it down!
    ! Purpose: Add any helper logic you need
    pure function helperFunction(x) result(y)
        integer, intent(in) :: x
        integer :: y
        ! TODO: Implement helper logic
        y = x
    end function
    
end program TuxModernChallenge
